website_summaries.verdict: Enjoying success since its release, the Puma Suede truly does not disappoint. The current version, the Puma Suede Classic Explosive, receives so many compliments from purchasers and their friends. Aside from style, they enthusiastically point out the comfort that this shoe gives. At less than $90 a pair, the Suede Explosive is in many ways a good deal.
pros: There are several explosive colorways to choose from
Some reviewers pointed out that the lightness of this model is just great
Several reviewers expressed that they are very motivated to recommend the Puma Suede Classic Explosive to their friends
Many purchasers think that this model is easily one of the most comfortable pair of kicks that they have ever owned
A lot of wearers excitedly shared that they get a lot of positive comments from colleagues and acquaintances when they go out wearing their Puma Suede Classic Explosive
Many of those who already bought a pair loved the fit and style so much that they ordered more pairs
A pair of Puma Suede Classic Explosive shoes does not really cost a fortune
cons: Quite a few reviewers disclosed that this shoe does not provide the necessary amount of support
A considerable number of purchasers shared that the more recent Puma Suede releases, including this version, are narrower than the Suedes of the past
Some wearers noted that this shoe requires a considerable break-in period

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky sole drives me nuts.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoe's looks. However, they are a little smaller than I expected. After a couple of weeks of wear the left shoe started squeaking with every step. It seems like something is broken in the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Jbrew

customer_reviews.title: The shoes look amazing I think
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look amazing I think. Could be better with a little more accents in a different color on the fabric but otherwise pretty great. They're also comfortable. However, I'm going to replace them because there's this little black piece of thread woven into the rubber near the front of the left shoe and because the rubber is clear, it's very visible. Hopefully the next pair won't have that flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Good looks, too narrow
customer_reviews.text: For looks, these shoes are amazing, but unlike other skater looking shoes, like Vanz, the shoes are very narrow. I never go with a wide width, because I do not have wide feet, but these particular shoes were so narrow that I did not try walking with them out of the house. I knew, right away, that they were not going to break in. Still a great product, if you have narrow feet. They look perfect with jeans, and the blue hue to the sole was really cool
customer_reviews.author: Michael Caesar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, but second pair that I received was quite discolored and looked very aged - returned
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Kerluke

customer_reviews.title: it is comfortable to wear all day while walking and will likely ...
customer_reviews.text: Reviews said they were a little small, and that is correct. The suede is thick and does not give as much as kangaroo leather. However, it is comfortable to wear all day while walking and will likely stretch some with use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I have somewhat wide feet so I was a bit worried cause it was the first time I bought shoes online, I didn't know how they'd fit. Luckily, The shoes fit great, They don't feel narrow or tight on my feet. Like any other shoe, I wouldn't recommend wearing them a full 24/7 until you've broken them in for a bit but once broken in, They're a great shoe to have.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haywood

customer_reviews.title: or just a cool little accent
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well, and the sole is unique. This shoe can be either the focus of an outfit, or just a cool little accent.

product_meta.title: PUMA Mens Suede Classic Explosive-M Suede Classic Explosive
product_meta.description: Definitely the most well-known and popular of all PUMA shoes, this sport classic is one of the shoe that built the succes of the german sports brand. As part of every street community from the 80's on, the suede has even been involved in historical matters on a global scale. The explosive pack will see a number of loud-and-proud colours adorn the suede construction.
